data.name: DroidconKE
data.description: Droidcon is a global conference focused on the engineering of Android applications. Droidcon provides a forum for developers to network with other developers, share techniques, announce apps and products, and to learn and teach.

data.name: Mobile
data.description: iOS and Android mobile design and development conferences.
